plot: This is a story, revolving around Rajeev and Priya , who are diametrically opposite to each other, and their whimsical 'Marriage', involving other mad, crazy,weird, eccentric and clumsy people...
title: Ajab Lagnachi Gajab Gosht
plot_es: This is a story, revolving around Rajeev and Priya , who are diametrically opposite to each other, and their whimsical 'Marriage', involving other mad, crazy,weird, eccentric and clumsy people...
